Construction.Requirements: Craft Staff, crushing despair, hideous laughter, mass suggestion, mind fog, sleep, suggestion

sections.body:
Often made from applewood and topped with a clear crystal, this staff allows use of the following spells:

  • Hideous laughter (1 charge)
  • Sleep (1 charge)
  • Suggestion (1 charge)
  • Crushing despair (2 charges)
  • Mind fog (2 charges)
  • Mass suggestion (3 charges)
sections.name: Description
